note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Because writing short notes on your mobile device should be easy, free, synchronized and open source.
name: NoNonsense Notes
body:
![Nexus 7](/images/editor7.png)

**NoNonsense Notes** keeps your stuff safe in the cloud by syncing with [Google Tasks](http://www.gmail.com/tasks).
